title: Aliexpress Display Assemblies?
message:
Can anyone comment on the quality of aliexpress displays.

I don’t think I have the skill to replace the lcd only by taking apart the whole assembly.


[URL unfurl="true"]https://www.aliexpress.com/item/4000362134293.html?spm=a2g0o.productlist.0.0.5e136dd25RBcPI&algo_pvid=f2c4b2cc-8b14-4623-b311-c54f44816b6f&algo_expid=f2c4b2cc-8b14-4623-b311-c54f44816b6f-7&btsid=0ab6d69f15983151438643794e4bf1&ws_ab_test=searchweb0_0,searchweb201602_,searchweb201603_[/URL]

i mean is this legit? Are they assemblies with the real Apple logo or are these not to be trusted.
I don’t want to give a customer a bad screen.

I’m asking because I don’t know and am new to this.

title: Aliexpress Display Assemblies?
message:
I know someone who regularly buy LCD assemblies from China.
But he buy in bulk, directly from seller, not via Aliexpress.
The idea is, YES, in China they have good LCD assemblies replacements.
Good luck to find serious provider...

Aliexpress should cover you, if have any problem with the item.
